member.name: T:Leadtools.Annotations.Engine.AnnFillRule
member.summary: Specifies how the intersecting areas of objects contained in a polygon are combined to form the total area.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Annotations.Engine.AnnFillRule.EvenOdd
member.summary: Rule that determines whether a point is in the fill region by drawing a ray from that point to infinity in any direction and counting the number of path segments within the given shape that the ray crosses. If this number is odd, the point is inside; if even, the point is outside.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Annotations.Engine.AnnFillRule.Nonzero
member.summary: Rule that determines whether a point is in the fill region of the path by drawing a ray from that point to infinity in any direction and then examining the places where a segment of the shape crosses the ray. Starting with a count of zero, add one each time a segment crosses the ray from left to right and subtract one each time a path segment crosses the ray from right to left. After counting the crossings, if the result is zero then the point is outside the path. Otherwise, it is inside.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Annotations.Engine.AnnFixedStateOperations
member.summary: Options for controlling the fixed state of an annotation object

member.name: F:Leadtools.Annotations.Engine.AnnFixedStateOperations.None
member.summary: The object is not fixed. The object will move and scale accordingly when the container scrolls or zooms.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Annotations.Engine.AnnFixedStateOperations.Scrolling
member.summary: The object location is fixed. The object will only scale when the container scrolls or zooms but will not change position.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Annotations.Engine.AnnFixedStateOperations.Zooming
member.summary: The object size is fixed. The object will only move when the container scrolls or zooms but will not scale.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Annotations.Engine.AnnFixedStateOperations.FontSize
member.summary: Fix the font size of the annotation object. Any text that is part of this object will be drawn using its original point value regardless of the current container scale value.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Annotations.Engine.AnnFixedStateOperations.StrokeWidth
member.summary: Fix the stroke of the annotation object. Any line that is part of this object will be drawn using its original pixel size regardless of the current container scale value.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Annotations.Engine.AnnFixedStateOperations.LengthValue
member.summary: Fix the length part of the annotation object. For example, the ruler object will draw the tick marks as fixed if LengthValue was specified as part of the object's fixed operations (default).

member.name: T:Leadtools.Annotations.Engine.IAnnThumbStyle
member.summary: Defines an interface with properties and methods for representing thumbs (control points) for an AnnObject.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Annotations.Engine.IAnnThumbStyle.HitTest(Leadtools.LeadPointD,Leadtools.LeadPointD,System.Double)
member.summary: Queries the specified location to determine if a test point is over the thumb.
member.param: The location of the thumb to test in container coordinates.
The point to test in container coordinates.

The hit test buffer is used to make the test point "bigger" to compensate for errors and provide smoother hit-testing. For example, if the buffer value is 2, a square with a length of 4 units around the test point will be used to perform the hit-testing. This value is in container coordinates.
member.returns: The automation framework will call HitTest repeatedly to determine if a user input location is over a thumb. For example, to determine if the framework should start dragging a side of a selected object or to start rotating it.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Annotations.Engine.IAnnThumbStyle.Render(Leadtools.Annotations.Engine.IAnnObjectRenderer,Leadtools.Annotations.Engine.AnnContainerMapper,Leadtools.LeadPointD,Leadtools.Annotations.Engine.AnnFixedStateOperations)
member.summary: Renders this thumb at the specified center location.
member.param: The object renderer being invoked. This value must not be **null**.
The mapper object to use for converting coordinates. This value must not be **null**.
The center location of the thumb in container coordinates.
The fixed state of the owner object.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Annotations.Engine.IAnnThumbStyle.RenderHitTest(Leadtools.LeadPointD,Leadtools.LeadPointD,System.Double,Leadtools.Annotations.Engine.AnnContainerMapper)
member.summary: Queries the specified location to determine if a test point is over the thumb using the specified mapper.
member.param: The location of the thumb to test in container coordinates.
The point to test in container coordinates.

The hit test buffer is used to make the test point "bigger" to compensate for errors and provide smoother hit-testing. For example, if the buffer value is 2, a square with a length of 4 units around the test point will be used to perform the hit-testing. This value is in container coordinates.
The mapper object to use for converting coordinates. This value must not be **null**.
member.returns: The automation framework will call RenderHitTest repeatedly to determine if a user input location is over a thumb. For example, to determine if the framework should start dragging a side of a selected object or to start rotating it.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Annotations.Engine.IAnnThumbStyle.Fill
member.summary: Gets or sets the style to use for filling the thumb.
member.value: The style to use for filling the thumb. The default value is a white AnnSolidColorBrush.

member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether this thumbnail in visible.
member.value: **true** if this is visible; otherwise, it is **false**. The default value is **true**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Annotations.Engine.IAnnThumbStyle.Renderer
member.summary: Gets or sets the renderer for the parent object.
member.value: The renderer for the parent object (the owner of this thumbnail).

member.name: P:Leadtools.Annotations.Engine.IAnnThumbStyle.Size

member.summary: Gets or sets the style to use for drawing the thumb.
member.value: The style to use for drawing the thumb. The default value is a black AnnStroke with a length of 1.
